topic.title: MORPHOLOGY (ICD-O AT START SYSTEMIC ANTI-CANCER THERAPY)
topic.shortdesc: MORPHOLOGY (ICD-O AT START SYSTEMIC ANTI-CANCER THERAPY) is the Morphology International Classification of Diseases for Oncology (ICD-O) code at the start of the Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy.
